clean_panel.task_remove_from_text.toolti: Removes all content from the file starting from the first occurrence of the specified text
clean_panel.task_remove_duplicates.toolt: Removes duplicate content starting from the first occurrence of the specified text
clean_panel.task_remove_line.tooltip: Removes all lines that begin with the specified text
clean_panel.task_remove_blanks.tooltip: Removes consecutive blank lines, leaving only one
clean_panel.task_search_replace.tooltip: Searches and replaces all occurrences of the specified text

create_panel.save_metadata_button.toolti:
Saves the title, author and description for this working directory.
They will be loaded automatically when you open this directory.
create_panel.metadata.save_empty: Enter at least the title, author or description to save.
create_panel.epub_creation.confirmation:
Do you want to proceed with EPUB creation?
This may take several seconds depending on the number of chapters.

create_panel.epub_creation.error.depende: Error: Missing dependencies. Install: pip install beautifulsoup4 pypub3
translate_panel.enable_auto_segmentation:
Enables automatic text segmentation
according to the configuration in prompt settings.
translate_panel.check_translation_checkb:
Verifies translation quality
by comparing with the original text.
This option significantly increases
token consumption.
translate_panel.refine_translation_check:
Improves the initial translation through
an additional refinement process.
This option also increases
token consumption.
